introduction.p: Rationalizing the denominator of a fraction helps maintain accuracy.
Recall that a negative exponent indicates a reciprocal.

ol.label: a

li.p: Raise each factor to the power -2. Multiply exponents: (2bc^{-3})^{-2} = 2^{-2}b^{-2}(c^{-3})^{-2} = \dfrac{c^6}{4b^2}

ol.li: We cannot add or subtract powers with different exponents. 3x^{-4}-2x^{-3} = \dfrac{3}{x^4} - \dfrac{2}{x^3}
